sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' export default function AboutUs() { return ( //

About us

Clothing is not a luxury of etiquette, it is a mode of expression, a star armor that accompanies us in different stages of our life and releases our emotions.

This armor changes along with us, protects us and outside of defining ourselves, we define it, because we make something unique out of it and adapt it to who we are.

Dead Star It was born from love, effort and the search for oneself as well as the need to promote the self-love of each person.

My friends and family are part of this process as are all of you who have broadened the vision of this project and given it even greater meaning.

We would not be a universe without stars like you, all so different, so bright and so full of life.

THANK YOU ANGELS

Go to Shop
) }
